text: Alfons "Fons" Remi Emiel Viscount Verplaetse (19 February 1930 â€“ 15 October 2020) was a Belgian economist. He was Governor of the National Bank of Belgium (NBB) from 1989 until 1999. He was one of the main people that helped the creation Belgian Frank in 1982. He worked at the cabinet of Wilfried Martens. Verplaetse was born in Zulte, Belgium. Verplaetse died of COVID-19 on 15 October 2020 in Brussels, aged 90.Press release by the National Bank of Belgium on the death of VerplaetseEregouverneur Nationale Bank Fons Verplaetse overleden aan coronavirus ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Belgian politicians Category:Belgian bankers Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Brussels Category:Belgian economists
title: Alfons Verplaetse
